alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 2:01AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rankin, northeastern Yazoo, northeastern Hinds and Madison Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Coxburg to near Myrleville to near Brownsville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Way and Vaughan around 215 AM CDT. Ridgeland, Annandale and Sharon around 220 AM CDT. Madison, Canton, Gluckstadt and Cameron around 225 AM CDT. Camden and Farmhaven around 230 AM CDT. Fannin around 235 AM CDT. Goshen Springs and Pisgah around 240 AM CDT. Leesburg around 250 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Mississippi.
